name: Perturbing Stare
description: Your stare dulls your foeâ€™s reactions.
prerequisites: Mesmerist level 5th, painful stare class feature
benefit: When you trigger your painful stare, the target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your mesmerist level + your Charisma modifier) or lose its Dexterity modifier to AC for 1 round.
